pages.title: Finding the Keystone
pages.text: Finding Dungeon Keystones can be a tricky task, as the structures they spawn in are often found underground. Several important things to note is that they are mostly found underneath swamps and deserts. These structures are huge, ruin-like structures. Their tips can sometimes be seen poking out of the ground, giving an indication to their location.

pages.title: Unlocking the Keystone
pages.text: Unlocking the keystone is necessary to enter a dungeon. The main way this is done is through keys. Keys are crafted Using Cobblestone, $(l:asm:processing_soul#solidifier)Soul$(), $(l:asm:processing_soul#solidifier)Dark Soul$(), and $(l:asm:corrupted)Corrupted Planks$(). Right-Clicking a Keystone will unlock it and teleport you to a dungeon. This dungeon will have a 50% chance of being $(l:asm:dungeons#dungeons)Unstable$().

pages.text: This is the crafting recipe for the key.
